title: Woman Refuses To Compete In Pool Championship Against Man, Her Teammates' Supportive Response Drives Her To Tears
description:
We know that women are being robbed of the opportunity to win championships as society allows males to continue to compete against women.

It is a fact that males competing in women’s sports will always guarantee unfair outcomes. Up until five years ago, everyone and their grandmas knew this. This is why we had a system in place that separated competitions based on biology.

Lynne Pinches still knows this. That is why she refused to condone this un-leveled playing field at the expense of women.

Pinches ceded before the first break at the final of the Women's Champions of Champions tournament after being matched to play against Chris "Harriet" Haynes. Twelve days later, she got her deserved prize and applause from her fellow players.

Basically, Pinches refused to acquiesce to the blatant denial of sci

title: Catholic All-Girls College Will Now Admit Men Who Claim They're Women
description:
Inclusion is delusion. And in regards to this story, it is also blasphemy.

Saint Mary’s College in Notre Dame, Indiana, will begin allowing men who “feel” like a woman to enroll at the college in the fall, according to an email obtained by The Daily Signal.

President Katie Conboy wrote in an email to faculty that “Saint Mary’s will consider undergraduate applicants whose sex assigned at birth is female or who consistently live and identify as women.”

title: San Francisco Banks Won't Finance Small Businesses In San Francisco... Because Of What A Craphole The City Is
description:
There is no denying that the further left society moves, the more destruction it causes. In fact, only progressives can take the richest city in the country and turn it into conditions that the third world couldn't even dream of.

Basically, everything the left touches it ruins.

According to owner Mark Sackett, his event venue, which is also a printmaker and antique shop, will be auctioned off next year because he can't get a mortgage refinance due to the state of San Francisco.

— (@)

title: Biden sends email to 800,000 student loan borrowers to let them know that taxpayer forgave their debt
description:
Tuesday, President Biden sent an email that should have been an apology for the federal government's usurpation of the education system, but instead, informed 800,0000 student loan borrowers that taxpayers forgave their student loan debt.

That's right, 800,000 borrowers are set to receive emails from President Biden informing them that their debt was forgiven.

Here is what the email said, according to Axios:

"I hope this relief gives you a little more breathing room."

"I've heard from countless people who have told me that relieving the burden of student loan debt will allow them to support themselves and their families, or move forward with life plans they've put on hold."

"I'm

title: Watch: Squad Congressman Demands A Revolution Over Our 'Racist' Criminal Justice System
description:
Criminal justice activists tend to claim that this country has a mass incarceration and over-policing problem. It is very clear that there has been a campaign going on for years to convince the masses that criminal justice policies that increased prison sentences for criminals had no impact on crime, while systematically targeting minorities.

But what most activists refuse to admit is that the reason that there are more blacks and Latinos in state and federal prisons is because they commit more crimes than other races. That is just a fact.

title: Watch: Education Secretary Lacks Education, Butchers Famous Ronald Reagan Quote Used AGAINST People Like Joe Biden
description:
Many people on the right believe that humans possess dignity and are created in the image of God. Through the eyes of this worldview, education is intended to serve what is sacred. Unfortunately, the left controls the education system and to no surprise, not much “educating” is going on.

Many people on the left believe that humans are nothing more than a tool, and education is meant to shape that tool. Or in other words, indoctrinate them. A typical day for your average 3rd grader might include math, but that is actually racist so probably not. A lesson on biology that has nothing to do with biology. And maybe a lesson on Hitler. Oh sorry, I meant Trump. But that is the same thing, right? Well, at least to them it is.

Anyway, we have a lack of education coming out from someone tasked with just that. As you know who would say: “They are not sending their best.”

title: Watch: Here's How Democrats Can Replace Joe Biden And Why They Would
description:
Democratic officials all across the country have been moving to boost their national profiles and rumors have been circulating that this is intended to position themselves to run for president if President Biden unexpectedly drops out. Today’s show breaks down some insight into how the Democratic National Committee can and might replace Biden.

According to the 2024 Call for the Democratic National Convention, “In the event of death, resignation or disability of a nominee of the Party for President or Vice President after the adjournment of the National Convention, the National Chairperson of the Democratic National Committee shall confer with the Democratic leadership of the United States Congress and the Democratic Governors Association and shall report to the Democratic National Committee, which is authorized t

title: Doocy ropes KJP in with Thanksgiving question about Bidenomics: "Why are Americans not buying it?"
description:
Doocy played rope a dope with a dope on Monday and left Karine Jean-Pierre with only one option. Blaming Joe Biden's predecessor.

Fresh off of a Thanksgiving break where Doocy no doubt enjoyed a few of his dad's lasagna grilled cheese sandwiches (a favorite here at Brodigan Estates from the elder Doocy's cookbook), Doocy got cheeky asking KJP if she believed people sat around the Thanksgiving table remarking how much more affordable everything was and how it's all because of the wisdom of one Joseph Robinette Biden.

Spoiler: it was not. Doocy knows that. KJP pretends she doesn't know that. But we live in a world where people think families argue about politics during Thanksgiving dinner, so Doocy used that to his advantage.

— (@)

title: Watch Today's Show: Deadspin Cancels "Racist" Child for Wearing"Blackface" at an NFL Game
description:

title: Woke Deadspin writer wants to ruin this kid's life, then new photos (and old tweets) prove Deadspin are the assholes here
description:

Others watch because you never know whose life you can destroy in the name of progressive politics. Deadspin's Carron J. Phillips falls into that category, and he found a little kid to pick on.

title: Watch: UFC's Sean Strickland (and his gun) shows his is the WRONG house to trespass on: "I thought he was stealing my car"
description:
Imagine you are a domestic abuser on the run from security, and out of all the driveways in Las Vegas to hide out in, you choose UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland's. If anything, the schmuck is lucky Strickland only thought the guy was trying to steal his car. Had the champ known why the guy was in his driveway, the man may have had a sudden loss of balance and found his head smashing against the pavement.

Of course, this is all according to Sean Strickland. He's the one who shared the video from his security cameras, with the caption "POV: WHEN SOMEONE TRIES TO BREAK INTO MY HOUSE."

Strickland says the guy was drunk and "stomping out a girl." Security caught him, and the dude drove off in his car with security in hot pursuit.
